name: (Un)Happy Squares
description:
Unstable they said, and unstable they got. As a very first GameDev I was way out of scope.

This was my entry for Ludum Dare 49. Had a great time working on this game

(WASD) to move, (SHIFT) to dash, (Mouse) to aim, (Left_Click) to Shoot. Killing enemies triggers a teleport.
